name: 8ball
help:
Ask a question to magic the 8ball
Usage: //8ball <question>

name: Advice
help:
Gives some advice
Usage: //Advice

name: achievement
help:
You got an achievement!
Usage: //achievement <text>

name: alpaca
help:
Shows an alpaca
Usage: //alpaca

name: alpha
help:
Ask Wolfram|Alpha all your geeky questions
Usage: //alpha <query>

name: announce
help:
Sends an announcement in the specified channel
Usage: //announce <#channel> <message> [--noembed] [--thumbnail]
Aliases: //announce1, //announce2, //announce3

name: autorole
help:
Sets the role that members get when they join the server
Usage: //autorole <@role/disable>

name: avatar
help:
Shows your avatar or the one for the specified user
Usage: //avatar [@user]

name: ban
help:
Bans a user from the server (THIS WILL DELETE MESSAGES)
Usage: //ban <@user> [-r Reason]

name: bassboost
help:
Sets the bass boost on the music player
Usage: //bassboost <high/med/low/off>

name: bird
help:
Shows a bird
Usage: //bird

name: blackandwhite
help:
Overlays a blackandwhite filter over the provided image
Usage: //blackandwhite [image url]

name: blacklist
help:
Control the blacklisted words on your server
Note: People that have the kick members permission will bypass the blacklist
Usage: 
//blacklist list => Gives you a list of the current blacklisted words
//blacklist clear => Clears the blacklist
//blacklist import => Imports an exported blacklist
//blacklist add <word> => Adds a word to the blacklist
//blacklist remove <word> => Removes a word from the blacklist

name: blur
help:
Overlays a blur filter over the provided image
Usage: //blur [image url]

name: botinfo
help:
Displays some information about the bot
Usage: //botinfo

name: captcha
help:
Checks if you are a robot
Usage: //captcha <text>

name: cat
help:
Shows a cat
Usage: //cat

name: changelog
help:
Shows the latest changelog from the bot
Usage: //changelog

name: chat
help:
Have a chat with DuncteBot
Usage: //chat <message>

name: cleanup
help:
Performs a cleanup in the channel where the command is run.
To clear an entire channel it's better to use //purgechannel
Usage: //cleanup [amount] [--keep-pinned] [--bots-only]

name: clint
help:
Shows a picture of Clint staring at something on a monitor.
Usage: //clint [image url]

name: coin
help:
Flips a coin
Usage: //coin

name: color
help:
Shows a random color
Usage: //color

name: cookie
help:
blobnomcookie
Usage: //cookie
//trigger => Use when you are triggered.
Usage: //trigger
//spam => What do you think üòè
Usage: //spam
//wam => you need more WAM!
Usage: //wam
//mineh => HERE COMES MINEH!
Usage: //mineh
//invite => Gives you the bot invite link
Usage: //invite
//uptime => Shows the bot uptime
Usage: //uptime
//quote => Shows an inspiring quote
Usage: //quote
//screenfetch => Shows some info from screenfetch
Usage: //screenfetch
//website => Shows the bots website
Usage: //website

name: crash
help:
Crashes the bot
Usage: //crash

name: csshumor
help:
Sends a css-related joke
Usage: //csshumor

name: customcommand
help:
Create, edit and delete custom commands
Usage: //customcommand list => Shows a list of all the custom commands
//customcommand new <name> <text> => Creates a new custom command
//customcommand edit <name> <text> => Edits a custom command
//customcommand raw <name> => Shows the raw value of a custom command
//customcommand delete <name> => Deletes a custom command

name: deepfry
help:
Overlays a deepfry filter over the provided image
Usage: //deepfry [image url]

name: dehoist
help:
De-hoists a user
Usage: //dehoist <@user>

name: delet
help:
Delet this

help:
Creates a delete button
Usage: //delete <text>

name: dialog
help:
Displays a confirmation dialog
Usage: //dialog <text>

name: didyoumean
help:
Did you type your search wrong?
Usage: `//didyoumean <top text>|<bottom text>

name: discordmeme
help:
Shows a discord meme
Usage: //discordmeme

name: dog
help:
Shows a dog
Usage: //dog

name: donate
help:
Help keeping the bot up by donating
Usage: //donate

name: drake
help:
Generates the drake meme format
Usage: `//drake <top text>|<bottom text>

name: everyone
help:
Useful for when everyone is being pinged again
Usage: //everyone

name: facts
help:
Show people the facts
Usage: //facts <text>

name: flag
help:
Overlay your profile picture with a pride flag
Usage: //flag <flag/list> [@user]

name: flip
help:
Flips someone upside down
Usage: //flip [@user/text]

name: forcedisconnect
help:
Force disconnects the bot from music for when the bot is stuck
Usage: //forcedisconnect

help:
Force skips the current track
Usage: //forceskip [skip count]

name: freerealestate
help:
It's free real estate
Usage: //freerealestate <text>

name: guildinfo
help:
Shows some stats about the server
Usage: //guildinfo

name: hackban
help:
Ban a user before they can join your server.
Usage: //hackban<userId...>

name: help
help:
Sends you a list of all the commands
Usage: //help [command]

name: image
help:
Searches for an image on google
Usage: //image <search term>

name: insta
help:
Shows the latest picture on someones instagram account
Usage: //insta <username>

name: invert
help:
Overlays a invert filter over the provided image
Usage: //invert [image url]

name: issue
help:
Reports heavy and weird issues to the developers.
This will create an invite to your server, so we can join and help you directly.
Those issues are hard to explain / resolve if we can't see nor read the chat or other things that happen.
Usage: //issue <issue json> (issue can be generated at https://dunctebot.com/issuegenerator

name: iwanttodie
help:
You have decided that you want to die
Usage: //iwanttodie <text>

name: join
help:
Makes the bot join the voice channel that you are in.
Usage: //join

name: joke
help:
See a funny joke. Dad's love them!
Usage: //joke
//meme => See a funny meme
Usage: //meme

name: jokeoverhead
help:
You just got wooshed
Usage: //jokeoverhead [@user/url]

name: kick
help:
Kicks a user from the server
Usage: //kick <@user> [-r reason]

name: kickme
help:
Kicks you off the server
Usage: //kickme

name: kpop
help:
Gives you a random kpop member, command suggestion by Exa
Usage: //kpop [search term]

name: leave
help:
Makes the bot leave the current voice channel
Usage: //leave

help:
Gives a very lewd neko

name: linus
help:
Shows a picture of Linus pointing to something on a monitor.
Usage: //linus [@user/url]

name: list
help:
Shows the current queue
Usage: //list

name: llama
help:
Shows a llama
Usage: //llama

name: load
help:
Loads the given playlist file
The playlist can be exported with //save
Usage: //load

name: loadingbar
help:
Displays a progress bar that shows how much of the year has passed
Usage: //loadingbar

name: lockemote
help:
Lock an emote to some roles.
_Please note that you can't use the emote anymore if you don't have any of the specified roles,
even if you have administrator permission_
Usage: `//lockemote <emote> <@role...>

name: lyrics
help:
Search for song lyrics or show the ones for the currently playing song
Usage: //lyrics [song name]

name: mute
help:
Mutes a user in the server
Usage: //mute <@user> [-r reason]

name: muterole
help:
Sets the role that the user gets when they are muted
Usage: //muterole <@role/disable>
Aliases: //spamrole

name: nowplaying
help:
Prints information about the currently playing song (title, current time)
Usage: //nowplaying

name: pause
help:
Pauses the current song
Usage: //pause

name: pccheck
help:
Your pc needs to be checked, but for what?
Usage: `//pccheck <text>

name: ping
help:
Shows the delay from the bot to the discord servers
Usage: //ping

name: pixelate
help:
Overlays a pixelate filter over the provided image
Usage: //pixelate [image url]

name: play
help:
Plays a song on the bot or adds it to the queue
Usage: //play [url/search term]

name: playrw
help:
Plays a song on the bot or adds it to the queue
Usage: //playrw [url/search term]

name: pplay
help:
Adds a playlist to the queue
Usage: pplay// <playlist url>

name: pronounscheck
help:
Check someones pronouns
Pronouns can be set via //setpronouns
Usage: //pronounscheck [@user]

name: purgechannel
help:
Purges an entire text channel
Usage: //purgechannel <#channel>

name: radio
help:
Adds a radio http stream to your queue and goes to it
Usage: //radio <(full)list/station name>

name: readd
help:
Adds the currently playing track to the end of the queue
Usage: //readd

name: remind
help:
Creates a reminder for you, add --channel to remind you in the current channel
Usage: //remind <reminder> -t <number><w/d/h/m/s>
Example: //remind Clean your room :/ -t 1d5m

name: repeat
help:
Makes the player repeat the currently playing song
Usage: //repeat [playlist/status]

name: restart
help:
Start the current track from the beginning
Usage: //restart

name: reverse
help:
Reverses a string
Usage: //reverse <texxt>

name: roleinfo
help:
Displays info about a specified role or the highest role that you have
Usage: //roleinfo [@role]

name: roles
help:
Returns a list of roles on the server
Usage: //roles

name: salty
help:
Someones being salty today
Usage: //salty [@user/url]

name: saturate
help:
Overlays a saturate filter over the provided image
Usage: //saturate [image url]

name: save
help:
Saves a playlist into a file with can be loaded with saveload
Usage: //save

name: scroll
help:
The scroll of truth
Usage: //scroll <text>

name: seal
help:
Shows a seal
Usage: //seal

name: search
help:
Search for a song to play
Usage: //search <search term>

name: seek
help:
Seek in the currently playing track
Examples: //seek 04:20
//seek 00:50

Usage: //seek <minutes:seconds>

name: serverjoins
help:
Shows a graph with the joins for this server.
This is not a full history as it only looks at the members that are currently in the server.
Usage: //serverjoins

name: setcolor
help:
Sets the color of the embeds that the bot sends
Usage: //setcolor <hex color>
Aliases: //setembedcolor

name: setdescription
help:
Sets a custom description viewable in //serverinfo
Usage: //setdescription <description/disable>

name: setjoinmessage
help:
Sets the message that the bot shows when a new member joins
Usage: //setjoinmessage <join message>
Aliases: //setwelcomemessage

name: setleavemessage
help:
Sets the message that the bot shows when a member leaves
Usage: //setleavemessage <leave message>

name: setlogchannel
help:
Sets the channel for the modlogs
Usage: //setlogchannel <#channel/disable>

name: setprefix
help:
Sets the new prefix to use on this server
Usage: //setprefix <prefix>

name: setpronouns
help:
Set your pronouns to people can check them with //pronounscheck
Examples of pronouns are:
they/them/their/theirs
she/her/her/hers
he/him/his/his
ze/zir/zir/zirs
xe/xir/xir/xirs

Usage: //setpronouns <pronouns> [--plural]

name: setratelimits
help:
Sets our cooldown in minutes for un-muting your spammer of choice.
Example: //setratelimits 20|45|60|120|240|2400
Usage: //setratelimits <1|2|3|4|5|6/default>

name: settings
help:
Shows the current settings for this server
Usage: //settings
Aliases: //options

name: setwelcomechannel
help:
Sets the channel that displays the welcome and leave messages
Usage: //setwelcomechannel <#chanel>
Aliases: //setleavechannel, //setwelcomeleavechannel

name: shardinfo
help:
Get information about all things shards
Usage: //shardinfo

name: ship
help:
Ship two people and get their love score
Usage: //ship <@user> <@user>

name: shit
help:
Exclaim that something is shit
Usage: //shit <text> [--plural]

name: shorten
help:
Shortens a link
Usage: shorten// <link>

name: shuffle
help:
Shuffles the current queue
Usage: //shuffle

name: skip
help:
Skips the current track
Usage: //skip

name: slowmode
help:
Sets the slowmode in the current channel
Usage: //slowmode <seconds (1-21600)/off>

name: softban
help:
Kicks a user from the server (THIS WILL DELETE MESSAGES)
Usage: //softban <@user> [-r reason]

name: stats
help:
Shows some nerdy statistics about the bot
Usage: //stats

name: stop
help:
Stops the music
Usage: //stop

name: suggest
help:
Suggest a new feature for DuncteBot!
Usage: //suggest

name: tag
help:
Stores some text for later usage
Tags follow the same parsing as custom commands and the join/leave messages
Usage: //tag <tag-name/raw/author/delete/create/help> [tag-name] [tag content]

name: tempban
help:
Temporally bans a user from the server (THIS WILL DELETE MESSAGES)
Usage: //tempban <@user> <time><w/d/h/m/s> [-r Reason]

name: tempmute
help:
Temporally mutes a user in the server
Usage: //tempmute <@user> <time><w/d/h/m/s> [-r reason]

name: testflag
help:
No help available
Usage: //testflag

name: testtag
help:
Test your jagtag format before you save it as custom command etc.
Usage: //testtag <JagTag syntax>

name: thesearch
help:
Go on a journey to find intelligent life
Usage: //thesearch <text>

name: toggleannouncetracks
help:
Toggles if the bot should announce the next playing track
Usage: //toggleannouncetracks

name: toggleautodehoist
help:
Toggles if the bot should auto de-hoist users
Usage: //toggleautodehoist

name: togglefilterinvites
help:
Toggles if the bot should delete messages that contain invite links
Usage: //togglefilterinvites

name: togglejoinmessage
help:
Turns the join message on or off
Usage: //togglejoinmessage
Aliases: //enablejoinmessage, //disablejoinmessage

name: togglekickmode
help:
Toggles whether we should kick spammers or assign a role to them
Usage: //togglekickmode

name: togglespamfilter
help:
Toggles whether we should handle your incoming spam
Usage: //togglespamfilter

name: toggleswearfilter
help:
Turns the swearword filter on or off
Usage: //toggleswearfilter
Aliases: //enableswearfilter, //disableswearfilter

name: token
help:
Deconstructs a token to get as much information as possible from it
Usage: //token <token of a discord bot>

name: translate
help:
Translate a text from English to another language
Usage: //translate <destination language> <text>

name: ttb
help:
Converts your text into emoji bricks
Usage: //ttb <text>

name: unban
help:
Removes the ban for a user
Usage: //unban <user> [-r reason]

name: unlockemote
help:
Unlocks an emote if it was locked
Usage: `//unlockemote <emote>

name: unmute
help:
Removes the mute of a user if they are muted
Usage: `//unmute <@user> [-r reason]

name: unshorten
help:
Gets the long url from a shortened url
Usage: //unshorten <short url>

name: unwarn
help:
Removes the latest warning of a user in this server
Usage: //unwarn <@user>

name: urban
help:
Searches the urban dictionary
Usage: //urban <search term>

name: userinfo
help:
Get some information aobut yourself or from another user
Usage: //userinfo [@user]

name: vcautorole
help:
Gives a role to a user when they join a specified voice channel
Usage: //vcautorole add <voice channel> <@role>
//vcautorole remove <voice channel>
//vcautorole off
//vcautorole list

name: voicekick
help:
Kicks a user from the voice channel that they are in
Usage: //voicekick <@user/voice channel>

name: volume
help:
Sets the volume on the music player
Usage: //volume [volume]

name: vote
help:
Gives some links where you can upvote the bot
Usage: //vote

name: warn
help:
Warns a user
When a user has reached 3 warnings they will be kicked from the server
Usage: //warn <@user> [-r reason]

name: warnings
help:
Shows the active warnings that a member has
Usage: //warnings <@user>

name: xkcd
help:
Sends the latest xkcd comic
Usage: //xkcd [latest/random/number]

name: yesno
help:
Chooses between yes or no
Usage: //yesno

name: yoda
help:
Convert your input to how Yoda speaks
Usage: //yoda <your sentence>
